file_content.text: Count Alde? I'm an associate of Master Orgus Din. I'm here about the Death Mark project.
Yes. Much gratitude for restoring our communications.
I wasn't notified you were coming, but you'll want to hear this.
Aleyna, tell the Jedi what you told me.
I worked at the Death Mark research facility. We were conducting routine tests when Imperial forces breached our security doors.
There was a... hideous little man with them. A Sith, I think.
If it was a Sith, it's a miracle you survived.
You're lucky to be alive.
I'd be dead, if not for the Jedi.
We sent a Jedi Master to protect your facility. Was he there?
Were you undefended?
He saved my life.
People usually know a Sith when they see one. What makes you unsure?
Tell me about him.
He just seemed... different. He barely spoke. Let the Imperials do all the fighting--until the Jedi came.
Before anyone knew what happened, a single Jedi wiped out all the Imperial troops.
Way to take care of business, Master Orgus.
Master Orgus = one tough Jedi!
Master Orgus, I presume.
I'm sorry, but the Jedi... he didn't survive. The Sith was deadly. He'd vanish, then leap out of the shadows.
He surprised your friend. Stabbed him in the back. It was horrible.
He was a great Jedi. He taught me well.
This is tragic news.
He was your--I didn't realize.
You're sure Master Orgus was killed?
Hard to believe he's dead.
No one could survive that.
Master Orgus was old and weak.
I'm not surprised he blew it.
I wish I could tell you he died well, but....
When the Jedi fell, the Sith summoned reinforcements. But not Imperials--Killiks.
Intelligent, man-sized insects living underground. Flesh eaters. Ghastly things.
How did the Sith communicate with them?
Do they speak Basic?
Oh, they're highly evolved--that's what makes them deadly.
Sounds like the Killiks and Sith were separated at birth.
That's what the enemy likes.
If they've allied with the enemy, they're dead.
Consider them exterminated.
Easier said than done. They're frightfully efficient killers. Some grow quite large.
Those things poured into the facility. Started tearing everyone apart. I ran.
There was nothing you could've done. Thank the stars you survived to give us this news.
The Sith now controls the Death Mark. No telling who he's targeted.
I can pick up the Sith's trail at the research labs.
Then I need to move quickly.
It's blasted dangerous. Killiks in such large numbers? Virtually unstoppable.
From what I understand, targets can only be marked at close range.
He'd have to get close.
True, but that Sith... I think he could go anywhere he wanted.
Is there evidence this weapon has killed someone?
Is anyone dead from it yet?
With war raging around us, how would we notice?
Wynne Organa is organizing peace talks with the other houses. It's possible the Sith--
I'm sure one of my diplomats will assist you. Please excuse me.
